attributes.title: dear diary..
attributes.review:
dear diary, 
    on july 9th, 2020 i decided to download a lovely, attractive, eye catching app from yours truly Donald John Trump a.k. cheeto man. i was hoping from downloading this app i would learn how to airbend like aang, but sadly that app has let me down. so now i want to slowly drown myself in a bathtub full of cheeto man. you have ruined my childhood. 

    thank you and good night cheeto man.

attributes.title: Absolutely awful
attributes.review: This app is the worst app I have ever encountered. As soon is a downloaded it onto my phone, every thing slowed down and my phone stopped working. Every time I tried to enter the app it would taken forever to load and eventually glitch out. DO NOT get this app

attributes.title: Killed my cat
attributes.review: I made an attempt to download this app back in 2016, however it only finished downloading now. Download issues aside this app has SEVERE issues in terms of malware. The second the app completed its download my cat dropped dead. This is too much to be a simple coincidence. 0/10 Trump killed my cat and spat on his grave
